abstract: The entertainment company, often viewed as a window into consumer confidence, beat analysts’ expectations.
snippet: The entertainment company, often viewed as a window into consumer confidence, beat analysts’ expectations.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES — The success of the film “Marvel’s The Avengers” and the “Cars”-related expansion of a theme park powered the Walt Disney Company to a 24 percent increase in quarterly profit, well ahead of expectations, the company reported Tuesday.

headline.main: Buoyed by ‘Avengers,’ Disney Profit Surges 24 Percent
headline.print_headline: Buoyed by ‘Avengers,’ Disney Profit Surges 24 Percent
